rows.label: bf05410100_0010
rows.name: How awful...

rows.label: bf05410100_0020
rows.name: Looks like they didn't even get a chance to resist.

rows.label: bf05410100_0030
rows.name: Look! Over there!

rows.label: bf05410100_0040
rows.name: Watch out, here it comes!

rows.label: bf05410100_0050
rows.name: Aaargh!

rows.label: bf05410100_0060
rows.name: Ungh! Everyone OK?

rows.label: bf05410100_0070
rows.name: Just about, I think.

rows.label: bf05410100_0080
rows.name: We have to stop it!

rows.label: bf05410100_0090
rows.name: How do we do that?!

rows.label: bf05410100_0110
rows.name: On its back, there's an Superbian drive mechanism.

rows.label: bf05410100_0120
rows.name: If we can somehow sever the cables connecting it to each leg,

rows.label: bf05410100_0130
rows.name: its energy supply will be cut off. It'll stop.

rows.label: bf05410100_0140
rows.name: Hikari-sama, I presume you'll be able to destroy them?

rows.label: bf05410100_0150
rows.name: Good plan!

rows.label: bf05410100_0160
rows.name: Sure. That sounds like a feasible measure...

rows.label: bf05410100_0170
rows.name:
That is, if we don't mind reducing the
whole area to ashes.

rows.label: bf05410100_0180
rows.name: What do you mean?

rows.label: bf05410100_0190
rows.name: According to the report I was given before,

rows.label: bf05410100_0200
rows.name: The weapon is powered by vaporized Divine Beast bodily fluids.

rows.label: bf05410100_0210
rows.name:
The gas it makes is completely unstable. The slightest
shock and we have a giant explosion on our hands.

rows.label: bf05410100_0220
rows.name:
There was...an accident here just three months ago
because we didn't see how unstable it was.

rows.label: bf05410100_0230
rows.name: If we'd just attacked without realizing that...

rows.label: bf05410100_0240
rows.name: Argh, dammit!

rows.label: bf05410100_0250
rows.name: Why make a weapon that dangerous?

rows.label: bf05410100_0260
rows.name:
As long as we got the weapon inside enemy lines,
destroying the weapon would destroy them too.

rows.label: bf05410100_0270
rows.name: That was the justification given.

rows.label: bf05410100_0280
rows.name: That's so cold it's almost impressive.

rows.label: bf05410100_0290
rows.name:
That's exactly why the Emperor called a halt
to the excavation.

rows.label: bf05410100_0300
rows.name: Can't we get at the people on board?

rows.label: bf05410100_0310
rows.name: The control center is protected by ten layers of armor.

rows.label: bf05410100_0320
rows.name: The chances of it being breached or destroyed are low.

rows.label: bf05410100_0330
rows.name:
But...that armor is limited.
It doesn't entirely cover the energy cables.

rows.label: bf05410100_0340
rows.name: So...it's them or nothing.

rows.label: bf05410100_0350
rows.name: How we get up on Divine Beast's back?

rows.label: bf05410100_0360
rows.name: Up ahead - there's a spot where the cliff juts out.

rows.label: bf05410100_0370
rows.name: If we can get up there, we'll be able to jump onto its back.

rows.label: bf05410100_0380
rows.name:
But if our timing's off, we go headfirst down
to the bottom of the cliff?

rows.label: bf05410100_0390
rows.name:
And we'd have to make it across
avoiding its attacks all the while.

rows.label: bf05410100_0400
rows.name: I'll take care of it.

rows.label: bf05410100_0410
rows.name: Fan?

rows.label: bf05410100_0420
rows.name:
I mean, I'll stop the Divine Beast moving. While it's stopped,
you all jump onto its back.

rows.label: bf05410100_0430
rows.name: Fan, you...

rows.label: bf05410100_0440
rows.name: All right, then! But you'd better be careful!

rows.label: bf05410100_0450
rows.name: Don't worry, I will.

rows.label: bf05410100_0460
rows.name: Then let's go!
